component.name: MarkUs Analysis
component.author: Honig lab (C2B2)
component.description: The MarkUs component assists in the assessment of the biochemical function for a given protein structure. The component in geWorkbench provides an inteface to the Mark-Us web server at Columbia. Mark-Us identifies related protein structures and sequences, detects protein cavities, and calculates the surface electrostatic potentials and amino acid conservation profile.
